## Ignore Visual Studio temp files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Ignore generated cache files
*.assets.cache
*.nuget.cache
*.nuget.dgspec.json
*.editorconfig
*.AssemblyInfo.cs
*.InfoInputs.cache
project.assets.json
project.nuget.cache

# Visual Studio cache/options directory
.vs/
!.vs/ProjectSettings.json  # nếu muốn giữ setting solution

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx

# SQLite / Copilot / VS cache & database
*.db
*.db-shm
*.db-wal
*.dbmdl
*.opendb
*.jfm
*.sdf
*.vscode/
*.vsidx

# Copilot Index & CodeChunks
**/CopilotIndices/
**/CodeChunks.*

# Rider project files
.idea/

# VSCode workspace (nếu bạn code bằng VSCode đôi khi)
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# Backup & generated files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.swp
*.sln.ide

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
**/packages/*
!**/packages/build/

# Test results
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Microsoft Azure Web App publish settings
PublishProfiles/

# Publish output
*.pubxml
*.pubxml.user

# Docker related
**/docker-compose.override.yml
**/docker-compose.override.*.yml
**/docker-compose.debug.yml
**/docker-compose.debug.*.yml

# Node modules (nếu có frontend trong microservice)
node_modules/

# Logs
*.log

# Environment files (Secrets)
.env
.env.*

# JetBrains Rider DotCover
*.dotCover

# Others
*.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
